channel.title: 718 spawning issue
channel.description: hey guys, ok so i finaly figured out how to put my npcs faceing a dif direction, the problem is when i spawn them using this kind of method [code=java]World.spawnNPC(13611, new WorldTile(2338, 3179, 0), -1, false, EntityDirection.SOUTH);[/code] in my npcspawning.java(everwhere i put it this happens) the npcs spawn in that direction but there are thousands of them in standing in one spot, even though i only put the code in 1 file. any 1 know how i can fix this? :eek:

item.title: 718 spawning issue
item.dc:creator: @gimpie gimpie
item.description:

hey guys, ok so i finaly figured out how to put my npcs faceing a dif direction, the problem is when i spawn them using this kind of method World.spawnNPC(13611, new WorldTile(2338, 3179, 0), -1, false, EntityDirection.SOUTH); in my npcspawning.java(everwhere i put it this happens) the npcs spawn in that direction but there are thousands of them in standing in one spot, even though i only put the code in 1 file. any 1 know how i can fix this? :eek:
